tuv.seg: &Allow blank translations in the target files
在目标文件中允许空译文(&A)
&Allow translation to be equal to source
&Apply this font to the Project Files window
将该字体应用到项目文件窗口（&A）
检查简单的 printf 变量（例如 %s, %d）（&C)
&Go To Next Untranslated Segment stops when there is at least one alternative translation
转到(&G)下一未译片段，遇到至少一个以上可选译法时停下
&Make the file filter settings project specific
使文件过滤器只对特定项目有效（&M)
使片段分割规则仅对指定项目有效(&M)
跳过(&S) PO 文件头部
&value (of form input, including button, submit and reset)
&value (表单输入，包括按钮、提交扭和复位钮)

(In the user's manual, see 'Files to translate' > 'File formats' for a list of supported file formats.) To add files to the project, click on the Copy Files to Source Folder... button in the Project Files window or call this action from the Project menu and select the source files you want to copy.
（在用户手册中，查阅《要翻译的文件》的《文件格式》一节了解所支持的文件格式列表）要想向项目中添加文件的话，可以在项目文件窗口中点击“复制文件到原文目录”或者从“项目”菜单中进行该操作，并选择要复制的原文文件。
- 帮助 (*.xml) 和手册 (*.hmxp) 文件
- ability to run on any operating system supporting Java
- 在任何支持 Java 的操作系统上运行。
- clear and comprehensive documentation and tutorial
- 清晰全面的文档和教程
- flexible sentence segmenting (using an SRX-like method)
- 灵活的断句（使用类似SRX的方法）
- localization in a number of languages.
- searches in the project and the reference translation memories
- 在项目和参考翻译记忆中搜索
- searches of files in supported formats in any folder
- 在任意目录中搜索所支持格式的文件
- smart handling of projects including complex folder hierarchies
- 巧妙地处理包含复杂目录结构的项目
- support for OpenSource on-the-fly spell checkers
- 支持开源的实时拼写检查工具
- support for the Google Translate machine translation services
- 支持谷歌翻译的机器翻译服务
- use of any valid TMX file as a translation reference
- 使用任何有效的 TMX 文件作为翻译参考。
1) Reduce the number of source files and translate in batches;
1）减少原文数量并分批进行翻译。
2）通过在命令行或 OmegaT 启动脚本中指定 "java -Xmx<size-in-MB>M -jar OmegaT.jar" 增加 OmegaT 的可用内存；当前设置为 {0} 兆字节；
<html>Per-project external commands are disabled and will not be executed.
<html>每个项目的外部命令未激活，不会被执行。
A note is just a comment regarding this set of source text and translation.
注释是对当前原文和译文的思考的标注。
Add or rewrite encoding declaration in HTML and XHTML files:
在 HTML 和 XHTML 文件中新增或重写编码声明：
Allow translated tags to be in a different order
允许翻译过的标签按不同顺序排列
Allows to view, add, remove or edit a note in the active segment.
允许查看、新增、删除或编辑当前片段中的注释。
同时可以针对每个项目指定外部命令。

创建新文件夹时发生错误

你确定要自动修复所有标签吗？

As a result of this, all settings will be at their defaults, due to which you may experience unexpected, but correct behaviour.
由此，所有的设置都会设置成默认值，由于你可能会遇到异常，但确是正常的行为。

插入模糊匹配时尝试转换数字(&n)

Current memory usage by the VM: {0}MB; of which free memory: {1}MB; maximum available: {2}MB;

加粗显示所有原文片段(&s)
Displays alternative translations that you have created for segments that are repeated in the project.
显示在当前项目中给该片段创建的多种译文。
Displays comments in the active segment if they exist in the source file and the file filter supports it (e.g. PO-filter).
如果原文文件中有而且被文件过滤器支持的话(如 PO-过滤器)，显示当前激活片段的评论。
Displays the dictionary entries found in the dictionary files located in the /dictionary/ folder if they are present in the source segment.
如果词条出现在原文片段中，显示所有位于 /dictionary/ 目录的字典文件中找到的字典项。
Displays the glossary entries found in the glossary files located in the /glossary/ folder if they are present in the source segment.
如果词条出现在原文片段中，显示所有位于 /glossary/ 目录的词汇表文件中找到的词条。
Displays the translation memories segments that match the source segment.
显示和原文片段相匹配的译法记忆片段。
Displays the translation of the source segment by the machine translation services you have selected in Options > Machine Translate, if those services are available.
在机器翻译服务可用的情况下，显示 选项 > 机器翻译 中设定的这些服务对原文片段的翻译。
Do not allow creating translated documents with tag issues
不允许创建有标签问题的译文文档。
Do not translate the content attribute of meta-tags with the following attribute key-value pairs (separate with commas):
不要翻译以下属性键值对内容的元属性标签（用逗号分隔）：
Do not translate the content of tags with the following attribute key-value pairs (separate with commas):
不翻译以下键值对（逗号分隔）的标签内容：

Here you may also specify custom location of project folders.
此处还可指定项目文件夹的位置。

Here you may setup the source filename patterns of files the filter will process, customize the filenames of translated files, and select what encodings it will use for loading the file and saving its translated counterpart.
在此你可以设置过滤器使用的源文件的文件模式，自定义已译文件的文件名，并用来选择载入和保存已译副本的编码。
Hunspell by László Németh and others (LGPL License)
László Németh 等人的 Hunspell (LGPL 许可协议)
If HTML file has the encoding declaration, it will be used disregarding any value you set in this dialog.
对于有编码声明的HTML文件，将会忽略你在此对话框中设置的任何编码值。
If a HHC or HHK file has an encoding declaration, it will be used regardless of any value you specify in this dialog.
对于有编码声明的HHC或HHK文件，将会忽略你在此对话框中设置的任何编码值。
If later access to the desired location is granted that location will be used and all settings will return to their defaults as a result of the location change.
如果之后要访问的位置得到了许可，将使用该位置 且由于位置变化，所有的设置将会恢复到默认值。
If the filter has any options, you may change them by clicking Options.
如果过滤器有可选项，你可以通过点击选项来改变它们。
If you are in any doubt, we recommend that you use the version supplied with JRE.
如果还是有疑问，我们建议您使用附带了 JRE 的版本。
If you are not very familiar with Linux, we therefore recommend that you install an OmegaT version with JRE included.
如果对 Linux 不是很熟悉的话，我们建议安装带有 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。
If you are using an authenticated proxy, please enter here your user and password.
如果用的是需要认证的代理服务器，请输入用户名和密码。
If you have already Java, one way to install the current version of OmegaT is to use Java Web Start.
如果已经装了 Java，安装当前版本 OmegaT 的途径之一是使用 Java Web Start。
If you install a version of Java at system level, you must either ensure that it is in your launch path, or call it explicitly when launching OmegaT.
如果在系统级安装了某个版本的 Java，你要么确保它处于启动路径当中， 要么必须在启动 OmegaT 时明确地对它进行调用。
If you want to use the same language in OmegaT as the one used during installation, check the box below.
如果要在 OmegaT 中使用安装时所用的语言，请勾选下面的方框。
In order for the changes to take effect OmegaT needs to close and then open the project.
为了使修改生效，OmegaT 需要关闭然后打开项目。
Include the first non-&unique segment when marking non-unique segments
标记非独特片段时包含第一个非独特片段（&u）
插入下一个丢失的标签
Installing and running OmegaT" in the User Manual.
使用 OmegaT 过程中遇到了 Bug？
It is free, that is you don't have to pay anything to be able to use it, even for professional use, and you are free to modify it and/or re-distribute it as long as you respect the user license.
它是免费的，也就是说无需支付任何费用就可以使用，甚至是用于专业用途；而且只要遵守用户授权协议，你就可以对它进行自由修改并且（或）重新发布。
It is used to mark your translations.
它被用于标记你的翻译。
It was not possible to create the script folder inside the configuration folder.
无法在配置文件夹创建脚本文件夹。
It was not possible to create translated documents, because some tags are missing or damaged.
由于标签丢失或者损坏，无法创建译文文档。
It will install the correct environment for your computer and the application itself on the first run.
它将在第一次运行时给您的计算机安装正确的环境和应用程序本身。
JNA by Todd Fast, Timothy Wall and others (LGPL License)
Todd Fast 、 Timothy Wall 等人的 JNA (LGPL 许可协议)
Keyword searches regard the specified query string as a set of search keywords (separated by space) and return all segments which contain all of the query words, in any order.
关键字搜索将指定的查询字符串视为一系列搜索关键字（由空格分隔），并返回所有以任何顺序包含这些关键字的片段。
Language not specified for translation unit variant.
没有为翻译单元变量指定语种。
Later calls do not need to be online.
之后再运行的话无需处于在线状态。
Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!
Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!
Linux users: OmegaT will run on the open-implementation source Java packaged with many Linux distributions (for example, Ubuntu), but you may experience bugs, display problems or missing features.
Linux 用户: OmegaT 也行可以在很多 Linux 发行版本（如Ubutntu）所附带的开源 Java 包之上运行，但可能会遇到 Bug、显示问题或者功能缺失。

本地译文未与远程仓库同步。

Steve Roy 的 MRJ Adapter （LGPL 许可协议）

Marc Prior is the coordinator of the OmegaT project.
Marc Prior 是 OmegaT 项目的协调组织者。

由于未作修改，无需保存项目。

Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching Language Pattern are applied in the given order.
注意：和匹配语言模式一起设置的分段规则集合将会以给出的顺序应用。

Note: DocBook files are recognized not only by file extension, but they also must have a DOCTYPE declaration: <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... for DocBook 4, or a Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" for DocBook 5
注意：DocBook 文件不仅仅根据文件扩展名判断，同时也根据 DOCTYPE 声明： <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML…… （对于 DocBook 4），或者是 Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" （对于 DocBook 5）
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HHC and HHK files that do not contain an encoding declaration.
注意：源文件编码设置至影响内部没有编码声明的 HHC 和 HHK 文件。
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HTML files that have no encoding declaration inside.
注意：源文件编码设置只影响内部没有编码声明的 HTML 文件。
Note: not all filters allow you to select an encoding.
注意：并非所有的过滤器允许选择某种编码。
OmegaT can also check for programming variables (printf-function variables) like '%s'.
OmegaT也可以检查程序变量（printf函数变量），如'％s'。
OmegaT can be customized to support other file formats as well.
还可以定制 OmegaT 来支持其它文件格式。
OmegaT 已自动选择“是”选项。
OmegaT is a computer-assisted translation (CAT) tool.
OmegaT 是一种计算机辅助翻译（CAT）工具。

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.
OmegaT 是一种免费开源的多平台计算机辅助翻译工具软件，它将模糊匹配、译法记忆、关键词搜索、词汇表和译法杠杆等融合成了最新项目。
OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing the name of your OS and/or the system property containing your home folder.
OmegaT 被拒绝访问包含操作系统名称和包含主文件夹的系统属性。
OmegaT is the original work of Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT 最初的工作由 Keith Godfrey 完成。
OmegaT packages which include the Java Runtime Environment are now available to save users the trouble of selecting, obtaining and installing it.
目前，封装了 Java 运行环境的 OmegaT 安装包可省去用户选择、获取和安装它的麻烦。
OmegaT ran out of memory, and will quit when you press OK.
OmegaT 耗尽内存，将会在点击确定后退出。
OmegaT supports the following file formats out of the box:
OmegaT 直接支持下列文件格式：
OmegaT 版本{0}, 第{1}次更新

OmegaT will automatically parse even the most complex source folder hierarchies, to access all the supported files, and produce a target folder with exactly the same structure, including copies of any non-supported files.
即便是遭遇结构极其复杂的原文目录，OmegaT 也可以自动分析，访问所有支持的文件，制作一个结构完全相同且包含所有未支持文件的译文目录。
OmegaT will try to resegment the TMX file...
OmegaT 将尝试对TMX文件重新分段。
仅当 (X)HTML 文件有 &header 声明时
Only if (X)HTML file has an &encoding declaration
仅当 (X)HTML 文件有 &encoding 声明时
Other contributions are detailed in the readme.txt file
更多致谢内容在 readme.txt 中。
Otherwise, OmegaT will use the language of the operating system.
否则，OmegaT 将会使用操作系统的语言。

Subsequent clicks on OmegaT.jnlp will check for any upgrades, if you are online, install them if there are any, and then start OmegaT.

TMX file was created by OmegaT 1.4.x or earlier.
The current folder will be used instead.
将使用当前文件夹来替代。
The '*' character matches zero or more characters (the search term 'run*' would match 'run', 'runs', and 'running', for example).
字符 '*'匹配0个或多个字符串（例如：搜索条件 'run*' 将会匹配 'run'、 'runs'和 'running'）。
The '?' character matches exactly one character ('run?' would match 'runs' and 'rung', for example, but not 'run' or 'running').
字符 '?' 匹配任何单个的字符串（例如'run?' 将会匹配'runs' 和 'rung'，但是不匹配 'run' 或 'running'）。
The PO filter threw an exception:
The TMX file will continue to be loaded.

将不会导入TMX文件。请尝试修正错误并重新载入项目。

The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where xx or xxx is the language code and YY is the region or country code (optional).

The most current info about OmegaT can be found at
可从下列网址获取 OmegaT 的最新信息：

The permissions you give to this version (which might be mentioned as an "unrestricted access to the computer") are identical to permissions you give to the local version, as installed by a procedure, described later: they allow an access to the hard drive of the computer.
您赋予该版本的许可（可能会被认为是“对计算机的无限制访问”）和您给予本地版本的一样的，如同后面提到的按步骤安装：它们被允许访问计算机硬盘。

Then while translating from Canadian French your project will use all the rules defined for all the language chain in the correct order.

This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

Thus, for example, rules for Canadian French (FR-CA) should be higher than rules for French (FR.*), and higher than Default (.*) ones.
例如，为 Canadian French (FR-CA) 创建的规则优先级应该比为法语 (FR.*)创见规则的优先级要高，也比缺省规则(.*) 要高。

You must enter a number between 1 and {0}.
必须输入 1 到 {0} 之间的数字。
You need to update your JDK 1.6 to the latest version, or just remove the jaxb-*.jar files from the OmegaT /lib dir
需要将 JDK 1.6 更新到最近版本，或者从 OmegaT /lib 目录中删除 jaxb-*.jar 文件。
